</P>
</EFX_FUTURE_SALE>
<EFX_SECURITIES_DESCRIPTION>
<A NAME="FIS_SECURITIES_DESCRIPTION_2"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_EG15901_DESCRIPTION_OF_SECURITIES">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_TOC_EG15901_1">
</A>
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	DESCRIPTION OF SECURITIES
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Issued Share Capital
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Our issued share capital is &pound;1,090,104.96, divided into 109,010,496 ordinary shares with a nominal value of
	&pound;0.01 per share. This number does not include: (i)&nbsp;ordinary shares issuable upon the conversion of approximately $3.6&nbsp;million of aggregate principal amount of debt owed to
	two convertible promissory noteholders into an aggregate of 14,510,771 ordinary shares (or 725,539 ADSs), which is expected to occur following the closing of the
	offerings; (ii)&nbsp;16,473,522 ordinary shares issuable upon the exercise of stock options outstanding as of November&nbsp;8, 2016, with a weighted average exercise price of $0.34 per ordinary
	share; (iii)&nbsp;6,639,473 ordinary shares reserved for future issuance under our 2015 Share Option Plan as of November&nbsp;8, 2016; and (iv)&nbsp;12,621,475 ordinary shares issuable upon the
	exercise of 12,621,475 warrants outstanding as of November&nbsp;8, 2016, with a weighted average exercise price of $0.28 per ordinary share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	American Depositary Shares
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Bank of New York Mellon, as depositary, will register and deliver American Depositary Shares, also referred to as ADSs. Each ADS
	will represent 20 ordinary shares (or a right to receive 20 shares) deposited with The Bank of New York Mellon, as custodian for the depositary in Manchester. Each ADS will also represent any other
	securities, cash or other property which may be held by the depositary. The depositary's office at which the ADSs will be administered is located at 101&nbsp;Barclay Street, New York, New York
	10286. The Bank of New York Mellon's principal executive office is located at 225 Liberty Street, New York, New York 10286.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;You
	may hold ADSs either (A)&nbsp;directly (i)&nbsp;by having an American Depositary Receipt, also referred to as an ADR, which is a certificate evidencing a specific number of ADSs,
	registered in your name, or (ii)&nbsp;by having uncertificated ADSs registered in your name, or (B)&nbsp;indirectly by holding a security entitlement in ADSs through your broker or other financial
	institution that is a direct or indirect participant in The Depository Trust Company, also called DTC. If you hold ADSs directly, you are a registered ADS holder, also referred to as an ADS holder.
	This description assumes you are an ADS holder. If you hold the ADSs indirectly, you must rely on the procedures of your broker or other financial institution to assert the rights of ADS holders
	described in this section. You should consult with your broker or financial institution to find out what those procedures are.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Registered
	holders of uncertificated ADSs will receive statements from the depositary confirming their holdings.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As
	an ADS holder, we will not treat you as one of our shareholders and you will not have shareholder rights. The laws of England and Wales govern shareholder rights. The depositary will
	be the holder of the shares underlying your ADSs. As a registered holder of ADSs, you will have ADS holder rights. A deposit agreement among us, the depositary, ADS holders and all other persons
	indirectly or beneficially holding ADSs sets out ADS holder rights as well as the rights and obligations of the depositary. New York law governs the deposit agreement and the ADSs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	following is a summary of the material provisions of the deposit agreement. For more complete information, you should read the entire deposit agreement and the form of ADR.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Dividends And Other Distributions
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	How Will You Receive Dividends And Other Distributions On The Shares?
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary has agreed to pay or distribute to ADS holders the cash dividends or other distributions it or the custodian receives on
	shares or other deposited securities, upon payment or
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	150
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
</P>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=156,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=304009,FOLIO='150',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_151">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	deduction
	of its fees and expenses. You will receive these distributions in proportion to the number of shares your ADSs represent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Cash.
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary will convert any cash dividend or other cash distribution we pay on the shares into U.S. dollars, if it can
	do so on a
	reasonable basis and can transfer the U.S. dollars to the United States. If that is not possible or if any government approval is needed and can not be obtained, the deposit agreement allows the
	depositary to distribute the foreign currency only to those ADS holders to whom it is possible to do so. It will hold the foreign currency it cannot convert for the account of the ADS holders who have
	not been paid. It will not invest the foreign currency and it will not be liable for any interest.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Before
	making a distribution, any withholding taxes, or other governmental charges that must be paid will be deducted. See "Taxation." It will distribute only whole U.S. dollars and
	cents and will round fractional cents to the nearest whole cent. If the exchange rates fluctuate during a time when the depositary cannot convert the foreign currency, you may lose some of the value
	of the distribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Shares.
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary may distribute additional ADSs representing any shares we distribute as a dividend or free distribution.
	The depositary will
	only distribute whole ADSs. It will sell shares which would require it to deliver a fraction of an ADS (or ADSs representing those shares) and distribute the net proceeds in the same way as it does
	with cash. If the depositary does not distribute additional ADSs, the outstanding ADSs will also represent the new shares. The depositary may sell a portion of the distributed shares (or ADSs
	representing those shares) sufficient to pay its fees and expenses in connection with that distribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rights To Purchase Additional Shares.
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If we offer holders of our securities any rights to subscribe for additional shares or any
	other rights, the
	depositary may (i)&nbsp;exercise those rights on behalf of ADS holders, (ii)&nbsp;distribute those rights to ADS holders or (iii)&nbsp;sell those rights and distribute the net proceeds to ADS
	holders, in each case after deduction or upon payment of its fees and expenses. To the extent the depositary does not do any of those things, it will allow the rights to lapse. In that case, you will
	receive no value for them. The depositary will exercise or distribute rights only if we ask it to and provide satisfactory assurances to the depositary that it is legal to do so. If the depositary
	will exercise rights, it will purchase the securities to which the rights relate and distribute those securities or, in the case of shares, new ADSs representing the new shares, to subscribing ADS
	holders, but only if ADS holders have paid the exercise price to the depositary. U.S. securities laws may restrict the ability of the depositary to distribute rights or ADSs or other securities issued
	on exercise of rights to all or certain ADS holders, and the securities distributed may be subject to restrictions on transfer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Other Distributions.
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary will send to ADS holders anything else we distribute on deposited securities by any means it
	thinks is legal,
	fair and practical. If it cannot make the distribution in that way, the depositary has a choice. It may decide to sell what we distributed and distribute the net proceeds, in the same way as it does
	with cash. Or, it may decide to hold what we distributed, in which case ADSs will also represent the newly distributed property. However, the depositary is not required to distribute any securities
	(other than ADSs) to ADS holders unless it receives satisfactory evidence from us that it is legal to make that distribution. The depositary may sell a portion of the distributed securities or
	property sufficient to pay its fees and expenses in connection with that distribution. U.S. securities laws may restrict the ability of the depositary to distribute securities to all or certain ADS
	holders, and the securities distributed may be subject to restrictions on transfer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	depositary is not responsible if it decides that it is unlawful or impractical to make a distribution available to any ADS holders. We have no obligation to register ADSs, shares,
	rights or other securities under the Securities Act. We also have no obligation to take any other action to permit the distribution of ADSs, shares, rights or anything else to ADS holders. This means
	that you may not
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	151
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
</P>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=157,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=708492,FOLIO='151',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_152">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	receive
	the distributions we make on our shares or any value for them if it is illegal or impractical for us to make them available to you.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Deposit, Withdrawal And Cancellation
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	How Are ADSs Issued?
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary will deliver ADSs if you or your broker deposits shares or evidence of rights to receive shares with the custodian. Upon
	payment of its fees and expenses and of any taxes or charges, such as stamp taxes or stock transfer taxes or fees, the depositary will register the appropriate number of ADSs in the names you request
	and will deliver the ADSs to or upon the order of the person or persons that made the deposit.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	How Can ADS Holders Withdraw The Deposited Securities?
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;You may surrender your ADSs for the purpose of withdrawal at the depositary's office. Upon payment of its fees and expenses and of any
	taxes or charges, such as stamp taxes or stock transfer taxes or fees, the depositary will deliver the shares and any other deposited securities underlying the ADSs to the ADS holder or a person the
	ADS holder designates at the office of the custodian. Or, at your request, risk and expense, the depositary will deliver the deposited securities at its office, if feasible. The depositary may charge
	you a fee and its expenses for instructing the custodian regarding delivery of deposited securities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	How Do ADS Holders Interchange Between Certificated ADSs And Uncertificated ADSs?
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;You may surrender your ADR to the depositary for the purpose of exchanging your ADR for uncertificated ADSs. The depositary will cancel
	that ADR and will send to the ADS holder a statement confirming that the ADS holder is the registered holder of uncertificated ADSs. Upon receipt by the depositary of a proper instruction from a
	registered holder of uncertificated ADSs requesting the exchange of uncertificated ADSs for certificated ADSs, the depositary will execute and deliver to the ADS holder an ADR evidencing those ADSs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Voting Rights
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	How Do You Vote?
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ADS holders may instruct the depositary how to vote the number of deposited shares their ADSs represent. If we request the depositary
	to solicit your voting instructions (and we are not required to do so), the depositary will notify you of a shareholders' meeting and send or make voting materials available to you. Those materials
	will describe the matters to be voted on and explain how ADS holders may instruct the depositary how to vote. For instructions to be valid, they much reach the depositary by a date set by the
	depositary. The depositary will try, as far as practical, subject to the laws of England and Wales and the provisions of our articles of association or similar documents, to vote or to have its agents
	vote the shares or other deposited securities as instructed by ADS holders. If we do not request the depositary to solicit your voting instructions, you can still send voting instructions, and, in
	that case, the depositary may try to vote as you instruct, but it is not required to do so.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except
	by instructing the depositary as described above, you won't be able to exercise voting rights unless you surrender your ADSs and withdraw the shares. However, you may not know
	about the meeting enough in advance to withdraw the shares. In any event, the depositary will not exercise any discretion in voting deposited securities and it will only vote or attempt to vote as
	instructed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We
	can not assure you that you will receive the voting materials in time to ensure that you can instruct the depositary to vote your shares. In addition, the depositary and its agents
	are not
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	152
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
</P>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=158,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=110319,FOLIO='152',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_153">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>

</A>

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	responsible
	for failing to carry out voting instructions or for the manner of carrying out voting instructions. This means that you may not be able to exercise voting rights and there may be nothing
	you can do if your shares are not voted as you requested.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	order to give you a reasonable opportunity to instruct the depositary as to the exercise of voting rights relating to Deposited Securities, if we request the Depositary to act, we
	agree to give the depositary notice of any such meeting and details concerning the matters to be voted upon at least 30&nbsp;days in advance of the meeting date.
</FONT>
</P>

</TD>

	&nbsp;

</TD>

<FONT SIZE=2>

	as stock transfer taxes, stamp duty or withholding taxes
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	depositary collects its fees for delivery and surrender of ADSs directly from investors depositing shares or surrendering ADSs for the purpose of withdrawal or from intermediaries
	acting for them. The depositary collects fees for making distributions to investors by deducting those fees from the amounts distributed or by selling a portion of distributable property to pay the
	fees. The depositary may collect its annual fee for depositary services by deduction from cash distributions or by directly billing investors or by charging the book-entry system accounts of
	participants acting for them. The
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	153
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
</P>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=159,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=853143,FOLIO='153',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_154">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	depositary
	may collect any of its fees by deduction from any cash distribution payable (or by selling a portion of securities or other property distributable) to ADS holders that are obligated to pay
	those fees. The depositary may generally refuse to provide fee-attracting services until its fees for those services are paid.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;From
	time to time, the depositary may make payments to us to reimburse us for costs and expenses generally arising out of establishment and maintenance of the ADS program, waive fees and
	expenses for services provided to us by the depositary or share revenue from the fees collected from ADS holders. In performing its duties under the deposit agreement, the depositary may use brokers,
	dealers, foreign currency dealers or other service providers that are owned by or affiliated with the depositary and that may earn or share fees, spreads or commissions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	depositary may convert currency itself or through any of its affiliates and, in those cases, acts as principal for its own account and not as agent, advisor, broker or fiduciary on
	behalf of any other person and earns revenue, including, without limitation, transaction spreads, that it will retain for its own account. The revenue is based on, among other things, the difference
	between the exchange rate assigned to the currency conversion made under the deposit agreement and the rate that the depositary or its affiliate receives when buying or selling foreign currency for
	its own account. The depositary makes no representation that the exchange rate used or obtained in any currency conversion under the deposit agreement will be the most favorable rate that could be
	obtained at the time or that the method by which that rate will be determined will be the most favorable to ADS holders, subject to the depositary's obligations under the deposit agreement. The
	methodology used to determine exchange rates used in currency conversions is available upon request.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Payment Of Taxes
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;You will be responsible for any taxes or other governmental charges payable on your ADSs or on the deposited securities represented by
	any of your ADSs. The depositary may refuse to register any transfer of your ADSs or allow you to withdraw the deposited securities represented by your ADSs until those taxes or other charges are
	paid. It may apply payments owed to you or sell deposited securities represented by your American Depositary Shares to pay any taxes owed and you will remain liable for any deficiency. If the
	depositary sells deposited securities, it will, if appropriate, reduce the number of ADSs to reflect the sale and pay to ADS holders any proceeds, or send to ADS holders any property, remaining after
	it has paid the taxes.
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_SECURITIES_DESCRIPTION>
<EFX_THE_EXCHANGE_OFFER>
<A NAME="FIS_THE_EXCHANGE_OFFER"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Tender And Exchange Offers; Redemption, Replacement Or Cancellation Of Deposited Securities
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary will not tender deposited securities in any voluntary tender or exchange offer unless instructed to do by an ADS holder
	surrendering ADSs and subject to any conditions or procedures the depositary may establish.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	deposited securities are redeemed for cash in a transaction that is mandatory for the depositary as a holder of deposited securities, the depositary will call for surrender of a
	corresponding number of ADSs and distribute the net redemption money to the holders of called ADSs upon surrender of those ADSs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	there is any change in the deposited securities such as a sub-division, combination or other reclassification, or any merger, consolidation, recapitalization or reorganization
	affecting the issuer of deposited securities in which the depositary receives new securities in exchange for or in lieu of the old deposited securities, the depositary will hold those replacement
	securities as deposited securities under the deposit agreement. However, if the depositary decides it would not be lawful and to hold the replacement securities because those securities could not be
	distributed to ADS holders or for any other reason, the depositary may instead sell the replacement securities and distribute the net proceeds upon surrender of the ADSs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	154
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<!-- ZEQ.=5,SEQ=160,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=801058,FOLIO='154',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_155">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	there is a replacement of the deposited securities and the depositary will continue to hold the replacement securities, the depositary may distribute new ADSs representing the new
	deposited securities or ask you to surrender your outstanding ADRs in exchange for new ADRs identifying the new deposited securities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	there are no deposited securities underlying ADSs, including if the deposited securities are cancelled, or if the deposited securities underlying ADSs have become apparently
	worthless, the depositary may call for surrender or of those ADSs or cancel those ADSs upon notice to the ADS holders.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Amendment And Termination
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	How May The Deposit Agreement Be Amended?
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We may agree with the depositary to amend the deposit agreement and the ADRs without your consent for any reason. If an amendment adds
	or increases fees or charges, except for taxes and other governmental charges or expenses of the depositary for registration fees, facsimile costs, delivery charges or similar items, or prejudices a
	substantial right of ADS holders, it will not become effective for outstanding ADSs until 30&nbsp;days after the depositary notifies ADS holders of the amendment. At the time an amendment becomes
	effective, you are considered, by continuing to hold your ADSs, to agree to the amendment and to be bound by the ADRs and the deposit agreement as amended.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	How May The Deposit Agreement Be Terminated?
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary will initiate termination of the deposit agreement if we instruct it to do so. The depositary may initiate termination
	of the deposit agreement if
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	60&nbsp;days have passed since the depositary told us it wants to resign but a successor depositary has not been appointed and
	accepted its appointment;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	we delist our shares from an exchange on which they were listed and do not list the shares on another exchange;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	we appear to be insolvent or enter insolvency proceedings
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	all or substantially all the value of the deposited securities has been distributed either in cash or in the form of securities;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	there are no deposited securities underlying the ADSs or the underlying deposited securities have become apparently worthless; or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	there has been a replacement of deposited securities.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	the deposit agreement will terminate, the depositary will notify ADS holders at least 90&nbsp;days before the termination date. At any time after the termination date, the
	depositary may sell the deposited securities. After that, the depositary will hold the money it received on the sale, as well as any other cash it is holding under the deposit agreement, unsegregated
	and without liability for interest, for the
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
	pro rata
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	benefit of the ADS holders that have not surrendered their ADSs. Normally, the depositary will sell
	as soon as practicable after the termination date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;After
	the termination date and before the depositary sells, ADS holders can still surrender their ADSs and receive delivery of deposited securities, except that the depositary may refuse
	to accept a surrender for the purpose of withdrawing deposited securities if it would interfere with the selling process. The depositary may refuse to accept a surrender for the purpose of withdrawing
	sale proceeds until all the deposited securities have been sold. The depositary will continue to collect distributions on deposited securities, but, after the termination date, the depositary is not
	required to register any transfer of ADSs or distribute any dividends or other distributions on deposited securities to the ADSs
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	155
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_156">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	holder
	(until they surrender their ADSs) or give any notices or perform any other duties under the deposit agreement except as described in this paragraph.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Limitations On Obligations And Liability
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Limits On Our Obligations And The Obligations Of The Depositary; Limits On Liability To
	Holders Of ADSs
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The deposit agreement expressly limits our obligations and the obligations of the depositary. It also limits our liability and the
	liability of the depositary. We and the depositary:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	are only obligated to take the actions specifically set forth in the deposit agreement without negligence or bad faith;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	are not liable if we are or it is prevented or delayed by law or circumstances beyond our or its control from performing our or its
	obligations under the deposit agreement;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	are not liable if we or it exercises discretion permitted under the deposit agreement;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	are not liable for the inability of any holder of ADSs to benefit from any distribution on deposited securities that is not made
	available to holders of ADSs under the terms of the deposit agreement, or for any special, consequential or punitive damages for any breach of the terms of the deposit agreement;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	have no obligation to become involved in a lawsuit or other proceeding related to the ADSs or the deposit agreement on your behalf or
	on behalf of any other person;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	are not liable for the acts or omissions of any securities depository, clearing agency or settlement system; and
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	may rely upon any documents we believe or it believes in good faith to be genuine and to have been signed or presented by the proper
	person.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	the deposit agreement, we and the depositary agree to indemnify each other under certain circumstances.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Requirements For Depositary Actions
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Before the depositary will deliver or register a transfer of ADSs, make a distribution on ADSs, or permit withdrawal of shares, the
	depositary may require:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	payment of stock transfer or other taxes or other governmental charges and transfer or registration fees charged by third parties for
	the transfer of any shares or other deposited securities;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	satisfactory proof of the identity and genuineness of any signature or other information it deems necessary; and
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	compliance with regulations it may establish, from time to time, consistent with the deposit agreement, including presentation of
	transfer documents.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	depositary may refuse to deliver ADSs or register transfers of ADSs when the transfer books of the depositary or our transfer books are closed or at any time if the depositary or we
	think it advisable to do so.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	156
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
</P>
<!-- ZEQ.=7,SEQ=162,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=153737,FOLIO='156',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_157">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Your Right To Receive The Shares Underlying Your ADSs
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ADS holders have the right to cancel their ADSs and withdraw the underlying shares at any time
	except:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	when temporary delays arise because: (i)&nbsp;the depositary has closed its transfer books or we have closed our transfer books;
	(ii)&nbsp;the transfer of shares is blocked to permit voting at a shareholders' meeting; or (iii)&nbsp;we are paying a dividend on our shares;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	when you owe money to pay fees, taxes and similar charges; or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	when it is necessary to prohibit withdrawals in order to comply with any laws or governmental regulations that apply to ADSs or to the
	withdrawal of shares or other deposited securities.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	This
	right of withdrawal may not be limited by any other provision of the deposit agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Pre-release Of ADSs
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The deposit agreement permits the depositary to deliver ADSs before deposit of the underlying shares. This is called a pre-release of
	the ADSs. The depositary may also deliver shares upon cancellation of pre-released ADSs (even if the ADSs are canceled before the pre-release transaction has been closed out). A pre-release is closed
	out as soon as the underlying shares are delivered to the depositary. The depositary may receive ADSs instead of shares to close out a pre-release. The depositary may pre-release ADSs only under the
	following conditions: (1)&nbsp;before or at the time of the pre-release, the person to whom the pre-release is being made represents to the depositary in writing that it or its customer owns the
	shares or ADSs to be deposited; (2)&nbsp;the pre-release is fully collateralized with cash or other collateral that the depositary considers appropriate; and (3)&nbsp;the depositary must be able
	to close out the pre-release on not more than five business days' notice. In addition, the depositary will limit the number of ADSs that may be outstanding at any time as a result of pre-release,
	although the depositary may disregard the limit from time to time if it thinks it is appropriate to do so.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Direct Registration System
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the deposit agreement, all parties to the deposit agreement acknowledge that the Direct Registration System, also referred to as
	DRS, and Profile Modification System, also referred to as Profile, will apply to the ADSs. DRS is a system administered by DTC that
	facilitates interchange between registered holding of uncertificated ADSs and holding of security entitlements in ADSs through DTC and a DTC participant. Profile is feature of DRSs that allows a DTC
	participant, claiming to act on behalf of a registered holder of uncertificated ADSs, to direct the depositary to register a transfer of those ADSs to DTC or its nominee and to deliver those ADSs to
	the DTC account of that DTC participant without receipt by the depositary of prior authorization from the ADS holder to register that transfer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	connection with and in accordance with the arrangements and procedures relating to DRS/Profile, the parties to the deposit agreement understand that the depositary will not determine
	whether the DTC participant that is claiming to be acting on behalf of an ADS holder in requesting registration of transfer and delivery as described in the paragraph above has the actual authority to
	act on behalf of the ADS holder (notwithstanding any requirements under the Uniform Commercial Code). In the deposit agreement, the parties agree that the depositary's reliance on and compliance with
	instructions received by the depositary through the DRS/Profile system and in accordance with the deposit agreement will not constitute negligence or bad faith on the part of the depositary.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	157
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Shareholder Communications; Inspection Of Register Of Holders Of ADSs
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The depositary will make available for your inspection at its office all communications that it receives from us as a holder of
	deposited securities that we make generally available to holders of deposited securities. The depositary will send you copies of those communications or otherwise make those communications available
	to you if we ask it to. You have a right to inspect the register of holders of ADSs, but not for the purpose of contacting those holders about a matter unrelated to our business or the ADSs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	ADS Warrants
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The following summary of certain terms of the ADS Warrants is not complete and is subject to, and qualified in its entirety by the
	provisions included in the Warrant Agent Agreement to be entered into by the Company and the Warrant Agent, which agreement has been filed as an exhibit to the registration statement of which this
	prospectus is a part. Prospective investors of
	the ADSs and the ADS Warrants should carefully review the terms set forth in the Warrant Agent Agreement. The Bank of New York Mellon will act as Warrant Agent for the ADS Warrants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Exercisability
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Warrants will be exercisable immediately upon issuance and at any time up to the date that is five years from the date of issuance.
	The Warrants will be exercisable, at the option of each holder, in whole or in part by delivering to us a duly executed exercise notice accompanied by payment in full for the number of ADSs purchased
	upon such exercise. Only whole ADS Warrants may be exercised. We do not intend to issue fractional ADSs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Maximum Percentage
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to limited exceptions described in the Warrant Agent Agreement, no beneficial owner of an ADS Warrant (other than a holder who,
	prior to exercise, beneficially owned in excess of 9.99% of our ordinary shares) shall have the right to exercise any ADS Warrants to the extent that after giving effect to the issuance of ADSs after
	exercise, such holder or a person holding through such holder (together with such holder's or person's affiliates, and any other persons acting as a group together with that holder or person or any of
	that holder's or person's affiliates), would beneficially own in excess of 4.99% of the Company's ordinary shares. Subject to certain exceptions, "beneficial ownership" for purposes of determining the
	Maximum Percentage is calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;13(d) of the Exchange Act and the regulations of the SEC thereunder. Upon request by a beneficial owner of an ADS Warrant, we will
	provide current information regarding the number of our outstanding ordinary shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Exercise Price
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The initial exercise price per ADS purchasable upon exercise of the ADS Warrants is equal to
	$&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(115% of the per ADS
	public offering price, subject to adjustment as described below). Except as described below, the ADS Warrants may not be exercised on a "cashless" or "net exercise" basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Restrictive Legend Events
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We will notify the respective Warrant agent and each ADS Warrantholder if we are unable to deliver ADSs via DTC or CREST transfer or
	otherwise (without restrictive legend), because (a)&nbsp;the SEC has issued a stop order with respect to the registration statement of which this prospectus forms a part, (b)&nbsp;the SEC
	otherwise has suspended or withdrawn the effectiveness of such registration statement, either temporarily or permanently, (c)&nbsp;we have suspended or withdrawn the effectiveness of
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	158
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
</P>
<!-- ZEQ.=9,SEQ=164,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=36648,FOLIO='158',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_159">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the
	registration statement, either temporarily or permanently, (d)&nbsp;this prospectus is not available for the issuance of the ADSs to the ADS Warrantholder, or (e)&nbsp;otherwise, each a "ADS
	Restrictive Legend Event". To the extent that the ADS Warrants cannot be exercised as a result of a Restrictive Legend Event or a Restrictive Legend Event occurs after a ADS Warrantholder has
	exercised ADS Warrants in accordance with the terms of the ADS Warrants but prior to the delivery of the ADSs, we will, at the election of the ADS Warrantholder, which will be given within five
	(5)&nbsp;days of receipt of such notice of the Restrictive Legend Event, either (A)&nbsp;rescind the previously submitted election to purchase and we will return all consideration paid by the ADS
	Warrantholder for such ADSs upon such rescission or (B)&nbsp;treat the attempted exercise as a cashless exercise according to the formula described in the Warrant Agent Agreement and refund the cash
	portion of the exercise price to the ADS Warrantholder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Anti-Dilution Provisions
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The exercise price per ADS and the numbers of ADS for which each ADS Warrant is exercisable will be subject to adjustment from time to
	time upon the occurrence of certain stock dividends and distributions, stock splits, stock subdivisions and combinations, reclassifications, rights issues, or similar events affecting our ADSs or
	ordinary shares, or upon the occurrence of a change in the ADS to ordinary share ratio.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Transferability
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to applicable laws, the ADS Warrants may be transferred at the option of the holders upon surrender of the ADS Warrants to us
	together with the appropriate instruments of transfer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Warrant Agent and Exchange Listing
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The ADS Warrants will be issued in registered form under the Warrant Agent Agreement with The Bank of New York Mellon, as Warrant
	Agent. The ADS Warrants have been approved for listing on The NASDAQ Global Market under the symbol "MTFBW."
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Fundamental Transaction
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If, at any time while the ADS Warrants are outstanding, (i)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly, in one or more related transactions,
	merge or consolidate with or into another entity, (ii)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly, effect any sale, lease, license, assignment, transfer, conveyance or other disposition of all or substantially
	all of our assets in one or a series of related transactions, (iii)&nbsp;any, direct or indirect, purchase offer, tender offer or exchange offer (whether by us or another person or entity) is
	completed pursuant to which the holders of our ordinary shares (including those represented by ADSs) are permitted to sell, tender or exchange their ordinary shares for other securities, cash or
	property and has been accepted by the holders of 50% or more of the outstanding ordinary shares (including those represented by ADSs) (but not including any ordinary shares (including those
	represented by ADSs) held by the person or entity making or party to, or other persons or entities associated or affiliated with the person or entity making or party to, such purchase offer, tender
	offer or exchange offer), (iv)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly, in one or more related transactions effect any reclassification, reorganization or recapitalization of ADSs or ordinary shares or any
	compulsory share exchange pursuant to which the ADSs or ordinary shares are effectively converted into or exchanged for other securities, cash or property, or (v)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly, in
	one or more related transactions consummate a stock or share purchase agreement or other business combination (including, without limitation, a reorganization, recapitalization, spin-off or scheme of
	arrangement) with another person or entity or group of persons or entities whereby such other person or entity or group of persons or entities acquires more than 50% of our outstanding ordinary shares
	(including those represented by ADSs) (but not including any ordinary shares (including those represented by ADSs) held by the
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	159
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
</P>
<!-- ZEQ.=10,SEQ=165,EFW="2230255",CP="MOTIF BIO PLC",DN="1",CHK=223778,FOLIO='159',FILE='DISK126:[16ZBI1.16ZBI15901]EG15901A.;62',USER='NDEWIND',CD=';9-NOV-2016;17:12' -->
<A NAME="A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_PAGE_EG15901_1_160">
</A>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	person
	or entity making or party to, or other persons or entities associated or affiliated with the person or entity making or party to, such share purchase agreement or other business combination),
	each an "ADS Fundamental Transaction," then upon any subsequent exercise of the ADS Warrants, the holders thereof will have the right to receive the same amount and kind of securities, cash or
	property as they would have been entitled to receive upon the occurrence of such ADS Fundamental Transaction if they had been, immediately prior to such ADS Fundamental Transaction, the holder of the
	number of ADSs then issuable upon exercise of the ADS Warrant, and any additional consideration payable as part of the ADS Fundamental Transaction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	the event of an ADS Fundamental Transaction, other than one in which a successor entity that is a publicly traded corporation whose stock is quoted or listed on a national securities
	exchange or AIM assumes the ADS Warrants such that the ADS Warrants shall be exercisable for the publicly traded capital stock of such successor entity, the Company or any successor entity shall, at
	the option of a registered holder of an ADS Warrant, exercisable at any time concurrently with, or within 30&nbsp;days after, the consummation of the Fundamental Transaction, purchase the ADS
	Warrants of that holder from that holder by paying to that holder an amount of cash equal to the Black Scholes value of the remaining unexercised ADS Warrants of that holder on the date of the
	consummation of such ADS Fundamental Transaction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Rights as a Shareholder
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as otherwise provided in the Warrant Agent Agreement or by virtue of such holder's ownership of ADSs, the holder of ADS Warrants
	will not have rights or privileges of a holder of ADSs or ordinary shares, including any voting rights, until the holder exercises the ADS Warrant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Ordinary Share Warrants
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The following summary of certain terms of the Ordinary Share Warrants is not complete and is subject to, and qualified in its entirety
	by the provisions to be included in the warrant agreements to be entered into by the Company and the Ordinary Share Warrantholders, a form
	of which will be filed as an exhibit to the registration statement of which this prospectus is a part. Prospective investors of our ordinary shares and Ordinary Share Warrants should carefully review
	the terms set forth in the form of Ordinary Share Warrant agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Exercisability
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Ordinary Share Warrants will be exercisable immediately upon issuance and at any time up to the date that is five years from the
	date of issuance. The Ordinary Share Warrants will be exercisable, at the option of each holder, in whole or in part by delivering to us a duly executed exercise notice accompanied by payment in full
	for the number of ordinary shares purchased upon such exercise. Only whole Ordinary Share Warrants may be exercised. We do not intend to issue fractional ordinary shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Maximum Percentage
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to limited exceptions described in the Ordinary Share Warrant Agreement, no Ordinary Share Warrantholder (other than a holder
	who, prior to exercise, beneficially owned in excess of 9.99% of our ordinary shares) shall have the right to exercise any Ordinary Share Warrants to the extent that after giving effect to the
	issuance of ordinary shares after exercise, such holder or a person holding through such holder (together with such holder's or person's affiliates, and any other persons acting as a group together
	with that holder or person or any of that holder's or person's affiliates), would beneficially own in excess of 4.99% of the Company's ordinary shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	160
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Exercise Price
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The initial exercise price for ordinary share purchasable upon exercise of the Ordinary Share Warrants is equal to
	&pound;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;($&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;) (115% of the per ordinary share public
	offering price, subject to adjustment as described below). Except as described below, the Ordinary Share Warrants may not be exercised on a "cashless" or "net exercise" basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Restrictive Legend Events
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We will notify each Ordinary Share Warrantholder if we are unable to deliver ordinary shares via CREST transfer or otherwise (without
	restrictive legend), because (a)&nbsp;the SEC has issued a stop order with respect to the registration statement of which this prospectus forms a part, (b)&nbsp;the SEC otherwise has suspended or
	withdrawn the effectiveness of such registration statement, either temporarily or permanently, (c)&nbsp;we have suspended or withdrawn the effectiveness of the registration statement, either
	temporarily or permanently, (d)&nbsp;this prospectus is not available for the issuance of the ordinary shares to the Ordinary Share Warrantholder or (d)&nbsp;otherwise, each a "Ordinary Share
	Restrictive Legend Event."
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;To
	the extent that the Ordinary Share Warrants cannot be exercised as a result of an Ordinary Share Restrictive Legend Event or an Ordinary Share Restrictive Legend Event occurs after an
	Ordinary Share Warrantholder has exercised Ordinary Share Warrants in accordance with the terms of the Ordinary Share Warrants but prior to the delivery of the ordinary shares, we will, at the
	election of the Ordinary Share Warrantholder, which will be given within five (5)&nbsp;days of receipt of such notice of the Ordinary Share Restrictive Legend Event, either (A)&nbsp;rescind the
	previously submitted election to purchase and we will return all consideration paid by the Ordinary Share Warrantholder for such ordinary shares upon such rescission or (B)&nbsp;treat the attempted
	exercise as a cashless exercise according to the formula described in the Ordinary Share Warrant agreement and refund the cash portion of the exercise price to the Ordinary Share Warrantholder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Anti-Dilution Provisions
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The exercise price per ordinary share and the number of ordinary shares for which each Ordinary Share Warrant is exercisable will be
	subject to adjustment from time to time upon the occurrence of certain stock dividends and distributions, stock splits, stock subdivisions and combinations, reclassifications, rights issues, or
	similar events affecting our ordinary shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Transferability
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to applicable laws, the Ordinary Share Warrants may be transferred at the option of the holders upon surrender of the Ordinary
	Share Warrants to us together with the appropriate instruments of transfer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
<I>
<!-- COMMAND=STYLE_ADDED,"MARGIN-LEFT:10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;" -->
	Fundamental Transaction
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If, at any time while the Ordinary Share Warrants are outstanding, (i)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly, in one or more related
	transactions, merge or consolidate with or into another entity, (ii)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly, effect any sale, lease, license, assignment, transfer, conveyance or other disposition of all or
	substantially all of our assets in one or a series of related transactions, (iii)&nbsp;any, direct or indirect, purchase offer, tender offer or exchange offer (whether by us or another person or
	entity) is completed pursuant to which the holders of our ordinary shares are permitted to sell, tender or exchange their ordinary shares for other securities, cash or property and has been accepted
	by the holders of 50% or more of the outstanding ordinary shares (but not including any ordinary shares held by the person or entity making or party to, or other persons or entities associated or
	affiliated with the person or entity making or party to, such purchase offer, tender offer or exchange offer), (iv)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly,
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	161
</FONT>
</P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	in
	one or more related transactions effect any reclassification, reorganization or recapitalization of ordinary shares or any compulsory share exchange pursuant to which the ordinary shares are
	effectively converted into or exchanged for other securities, cash or property, or (v)&nbsp;we, directly or indirectly, in one or more related transactions consummate a stock or share purchase
	agreement or other business combination (including, without limitation, a reorganization, recapitalization, spin-off or scheme of arrangement) with another person or entity or group of persons or
	entities whereby such other person or entity or group of persons or entities acquires more than 50% of our outstanding ordinary shares (but not including any ordinary shares held by the person or
	entity making or party to, or other persons or entities associated or affiliated with the person or entity making or party to, such share purchase agreement or other business combination), each an
	"Ordinary Share Fundamental Transaction," then upon any subsequent exercise of the Ordinary Share Warrants, the holders thereof will have the right to receive the same amount and kind of securities,
	cash or property as they would have been entitled to receive upon the occurrence of such Fundamental Transaction if they had been, immediately prior to such Fundamental Transaction, the holder of the
	number of ordinary shares then issuable upon exercise
	of the Ordinary Share Warrant, and any additional consideration payable as part of the Ordinary Share Fundamental Transaction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	the event of an Ordinary Share Fundamental Transaction, other than one in which a successor entity that is a publicly traded corporation whose stock is quoted or listed on a national
	securities exchange or AIM assumes the Ordinary Share Warrants such that the Ordinary Share Warrants shall be exercisable for the publicly traded capital stock of such successor entity, the Company or
	any successor entity shall, at the option of a registered holder of and Ordinary Share Warrant, exercisable at any time concurrently with, or within 30&nbsp;days after, the consummation of the
	Fundamental Transaction, purchase the Ordinary Share Warrants of that holder from that holder by paying to that holder an amount of cash equal to the Black Scholes value of the remaining unexercised
	Ordinary Share Warrants of that holder on the date of the consummation of such Ordinary Share Fundamental Transaction.
</FONT>
</P>

	Rights as a Shareholder
</I>

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">

<A HREF="#A2230255ZF-1A_HTM_BG15901A_MAIN_TOC">
	Table of Contents
